sentences.cn: 精心策划的广告宣传活动

sentences.en: If a number of capacitor segments are employed , AVR would also orchestrate their switching as required.
sentences.cn: 若采用电容器的分段较多, AVR按需要来编排它们的投切.

sentences.en: If photographers from outside Reuters orchestrate or set up scenes, it is still a set - up.
sentences.cn: 在新闻采访中,即便是非路透社的记者摆布了新闻现场, 这张照片也将被视为是摆拍的照片.

sentences.en: Some suggest that it has even helped to orchestrate some of the anger at Mr Zardari.
sentences.cn: 部分人的建议甚至有助于静心策划一些针对扎尔达里总统的愤怒.

sentences.en: The colonel was able to orchestrate a rebellion from inside an army jail.
sentences.cn: 这位上校得以在军队监狱里策动了一场哗变。

sentences.en: The riots were orchestrated by anti-government forces.
sentences.cn: 骚乱是由反政府势力策动的。

sentences.en: When you orchestrate, coordinate and otherwise mess with fate, it's best to fly under the radar.
sentences.cn: 当你协调, 协调和与命运,否则混乱, 最好躲过安全措施.

words.tran_cn: 管弦乐编曲；和谐的结合
管弦乐演奏家；管弦乐编曲家

trans.tran_cn: 给…配管弦乐； 精心安排， 组织
trans.tran_en: to organize an important event or a complicated plan, especially secretly

trans.tran_cn: 把（乐曲）编成管弦乐，和谐地安排，精心策划
